document.full_text: u.s. masters winner charl schwartzel will have an extra spring in his step at this week's pga championship after climbing into the world's top 10 for the first time.
document.title: masters champ schwartzel thrilled to crack world's top 10
lines_and_colors: u.s. masters winner charl schwartzel will have an extra spring in his step at this week's pga championship after climbing into the world's top 10 for the first time.
